AddProduct.title: What (additional) vegan products are available here?

BuyProduct.title: Buy something vegan here!
BuyProduct.description: Money is probably the only argument for veganism that everyone understands. So, argue for veganism by spending your money on something vegan here!

completedTasks.none: You're the first veganaut to use the money argument here. Thanks! This will motivate ohters to do the same.
completedTasks.some: The money argument has now been used {{ count }} times here. Thanks for the +1! This is additional motivation for ohters to do the same.

completedTasks.fallback: Here's an example of what someone might write here: "I told the staff that I came here because a friend said they have great vegan deserts. I love vegan deserts!"

rating.3: The vegan choice here is OK.
rating.4: The vegan choice here is good.
rating.5: The vegan choice here is excellent.

rating.5: Location with an excellent vegan choice

listCompleteness: List complete? - Switch to edit-mode and tell us!

listCompleteness.incompleteGoodSummary: List complete? - No, but a good summary.

quality.explanation: The more twigs the bigger and better the vegan offer here.
quality.noRatingExplanation: The quality of the vegan offer has not been evaluated yet. Be the first to rate it!

tags.explanation: The tags show what people like here.

existence.existing: This location is still in business
existence.wronglyEntered: This location entry was made by mistake

marker.title: Zoom in to show these {{numLocations}} locations.

globalFilters.title: Sort by
globalFilters.howSorted: How should the results be sorted?

hasOptions.title: Ask the staff for vegan options.
hasOptions.description: According to the staff, are there any vegan options available here?
hasOptions.description2: What do you think: are there any vegan options available here?
hasOptions.explanation: Explicitly ask for something vegan, or ask whether something is vegan, using the word "vegan". By doing so you can make sure that the staff realises: "Our customers are interested in vegan options, there's a demand." This improves the chances that they'll supply more and better vegan options in future.

outcome.yes: You said that according to the staff there are vegan options here.
outcome.no: You said that according to the staff there are no vegan options here.
outcome.ratherYes: The staff doesn't know but you think that they probably have vegan options here.
outcome.noClue: The staff doesn't know and you also have no idea whether they have any vegan options here.
outcome.ratherNo: The staff doesn't know but you think that they probably don't have any vegan options here.

wantVegan.title: Talk to the staff about vegan options.
wantVegan.description: What expressions did you or the staff use while talking about vegan options?
wantVegan.explanation: Sometimes the staff doesn't know what "vegan" means, or you are unsure whether they know. Sometimes they seem to confuse it with something else, or they forget that e.g. butter isn't vegan. At other times, the staff explains how their vegan options are produced, or what they contain.

outcome.description: You talked to the staff about vegan options and the following expressions were used:

particularOption.title: Ask for a specific vegan product.
particularOption.description: Which specific vegan product did you ask for?
particularOption.explanation: Ask the staff for one or several specific vegan products that you are interested in. If they don't sell them yet they might do so in the future, given enough people ask for them.

form.placeholder: Enter the product which you asked for

outcome.description: You asked for these vegan products:

buyOptions.title: Buy something vegan.
buyOptions.explanation: Do you fancy one or the other vegan product available here? If so, you can show the staff that it pays off to supply vegan products by buying them. And while you're paying, why not mention that you chose this product (in part) because it's vegan? The more the staff hears the word "vegan" in a positive context, the better.

giveFeedback.title: Mission: Impossible.
giveFeedback.description: What kind of impossible mission did you attempt here?
giveFeedback.explanation: Sometimes it's the most improbable things that work the best. Maybe they'll put a vegan version of your favourite dish on the menu if you ask really nicely, or they switch their whole offer to vegan options if you tell them about all the vegan things there are.

outcome.description: You tried this mission impossible here:

rating.noRating: This product hasn't been rated yet.

availability.sometimes: This offer is not always available.
availability.not: This offer is no longer available.
